content: add a little love to your winter wardrobe with this free crochet heart hat pattern this cozy beanie features rounds of colorful hearts a soft ribbed brim and a playful pom pom on top designed in toddler child and adult sizes it s a fun and beginner-friendly project that makes a perfect holiday gift or matching family set whether you make one for yourself or as a heartfelt handmade present this crochet hat with hearts will keep everyone warm and smiling all season long
